Attached is a patch for MonoRail VS.NET Wizard with the following improvements:
* General: more examples, more test cases, small fixes * New LoginController and ContactController * Test cases for the new controllers, using the approach described at http://using.castleproject.org/display/MR/TDDingControllers * Using the "new" sintaxt for ViewEngines configuration in web.config * Removed VS7 directory * New templates showing some examples of FormHelper, UrlHelper, SmartDispatcherController and etc... * Some directory cleanup / organization
